title: Quiz 1 - Seating Arrangement
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Study the following information carefully and answer the questions given below.

Ten persons are sitting in two parallel rows containing five persons each in such a way that there is an equal distance between adjacent persons. In row 1, F, G, H, I and J are seated and all of them are facing south, and in row 2, K, L, M, N and O are sitting and all of them are facing north. One seat is vacant in each row. In the given seating arrangement each member seated in a row faces another member of the other row or a vacant seat. All of them like a different beverage, viz Sprite, Coca Cola, Thumps UP, Fanta, Pepsi, 7Up, Maaza, Frooti, Appy and Limca.

N sits third to the right of M and like Fanta. Only two persons sit between L and a vacant seat. L likes neither Pepsi nor Thumps Up. J is not an immediate neighbour of H. G likes Limca. The one who likes Thumps Up faces the one who likes Frooti. The one who likes Thumps Up sits opposite the one, who sits third to the right of the one who sits opposite N. H is not an immediate neighbour of I. O neither likes Pepsi or 7 Up nor faces a vacant seat. Neither N nor M sits at an extreme end. I faces M. The vacant seats are not opposite each other. Two persons sit between H and G, who sits third to the right of the one who likes Maaza. The one who likes Appy faces the one who likes Fanta. The persons who like Sprite and Frooti sit adjacent to each other. The vacant seat of row 1 is not adjacent to I. L sits at one of the extreme ends. M does not like Sprite or Frooti. The vacant seat of row 1 is not opposite N and it is not at any of the extreme ends.

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belongs to that group?
options: N – Cobb
J – Van Heusen
E – Adidas
L – Reebok
G – Duke

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are not true?
options: F sits third to the right of the one who likes Reebok.
J is not an immediate neighbour of the one who likes Adidas.
G likes Van Heusen and faces the centre.
Both [2] and [3]
None of these

quiz.text: What is the position of E with respect to the one who likes Cobb?
options: Third to the right
Second to the left
Third to the left
Second to the right
None of these

quiz.text: Who sits second to the left of the one who likes Nike?
options: The one who likes Cobb
The one who likes Lee
The one who likes Reebok
The one who likes Duke
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons sit between G and The one who likes Levis, if counted in clockwise direction from G?
options: None
One
Two
Three
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are not true?
options: One of the immediate neighbours of S faces south.
W is the father of R.
P’s daughter sits third to the right of her mother.
Both [1] and [3]
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons are facing south?
options: Four
Five
Three
Two
None of these

quiz.text: Who sits second to the left of V’s father-in-law?
options: The brother of R
The mother of U
The father of T
Can’t be determined
None of these

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: S
T
P
X
Q

quiz.text: What is the position of the son of X with respect to the other daughter-in-law of Q?
options: Second to the right
Third to the right
Second to the left
Third to the left
None of these

quiz.text: Who is the director of Facebook?
options: R
J
N
S
T

quiz.text: Which of the following groups works in the USA?
options: R and T
W, N and J
N and T
T, Z and V
V and T

quiz.text: Z is the director of which company?
options: Reliance
Paytm
Kingfisher
Amul
Microsoft

options: W
V
N
P
T

quiz.text: Who is the director of Apple Company?
options: J
R
V
S
W

quiz.text: Who among the following sits second to the left of N?
options: S
V
R
T
Other than the given options

quiz.text: Who among the following sits exactly between W and T?
options: Wife of T
Brother of N
Sister of Z
Sister of S
Other than the given options

quiz.text: How many members are there in the family of T?
options: Four
Two
Three
Cannot be determined
Five

quiz.text: What is the relation between S and R?
options: Brother
Son
Sister
Brother-in-law
Other than the given options.

quiz.text: Who among the following is 3rd to the left of V?
options: Z
N
P
W
R

quiz.text: Who sits second to the right of the one who faces the vacant seat of row 2?
options: The one who likes Fanta
The one who likes Limca
The one who likes Coca Cola
The one who likes Sprite
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following beverages does O like?
options: Limca
Coca Cola
Thumps Up
Frooti
Sprite

quiz.text: If J is related to the vacant seat of row 1 in the same way as O is related to K, then following the same pattern, the vacant seat of row 2 is related to who among the following?
options: L
I
M
K
None of these

quiz.text: Who sits diagonally opposite the one who likes 7 Up?
options: The one who sits on the immediate left of the one who likes Appy.
The one who faces the vacant seat in row 2.
The one who likes Maaza
The one who faces the person who likes Coca Cola.
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true regarding K?
options: K sits second to the right of O.
K is not an immediate neighbour of N.
K sits third to the left of M.
K sits at one of the extreme ends of the line.
K faces the vacant seat of row 1.
